list.bullet:
Loop over all nodes, and:
*Store the node in a different cache database* If a node has tags, store in the collection.

Loop over all the ways, and:
*Look up locations for each node in the cache database* Store the way into the collection

Loop over all the relations, and:
*See whether we have multi-polygon relations and do something clever with them* Remove ways that were converted into a multi-polygon
